en.title: Community Health Worker Digital Support Platform
en.purpose: Develop and deploy a comprehensive digital platform to support community health workers in delivering primary healthcare services, conducting health education, and collecting vital health data in remote and underserved communities.
en.scope:
This use case covers the implementation of a digital platform that:

- Equips community health workers with mobile tools for patient care and data collection
- Provides clinical decision support and treatment protocols
- Enables real-time reporting and communication with health facilities
- Supports health education and community engagement activities
- Facilitates performance monitoring and continuous training
- Integrates supply chain management for medical supplies and commodities
en.actors:
**Community Health Workers:**
- **Village Health Workers** – Provide basic healthcare services and health promotion
- **Community Health Volunteers** – Support health education and disease prevention
- **Peer Educators** – Deliver specialized health education on specific topics
- **Traditional Birth Attendants** – Assist with maternal health services

**Health System Support:**
- **District Health Officers** – Supervise and coordinate CHW activities
- **Nurses and Clinicians** – Provide clinical supervision and referral support
- **Program Coordinators** – Manage CHW programs and performance monitoring
- **Training Officers** – Provide ongoing education and capacity building
en.preconditions:
**Technology Infrastructure:**
- Mobile network coverage in target communities
- Smartphones or tablets for community health workers
- Solar charging stations or alternative power sources
- Basic internet connectivity for data synchronization

**Human Resources:**
- Trained and certified community health workers
- Established supervision and support structures
- Clear roles and responsibilities for CHWs within health system
- Community acceptance and engagement with CHW programs
en.process_steps:
**Phase 1: Platform Development and Customization (Months 1-6)**
1. Assess community health worker needs and workflows
2. Develop mobile applications with offline capabilities
3. Create clinical decision support tools and treatment protocols
4. Design data collection forms and reporting systems
5. Develop training materials and user guides

**Phase 2: Pilot Testing and Training (Months 7-12)**
1. Deploy platform in selected pilot communities
2. Train community health workers on platform usage
3. Test offline functionality and data synchronization
4. Gather feedback from users and supervisors
5. Refine platform based on field experience

**Phase 3: Scale-up and Integration (Months 13-24)**
1. Expand platform to additional communities and regions
2. Integrate with national health information systems
3. Establish routine supervision and quality assurance processes
4. Monitor performance indicators and health outcomes
en.postconditions:
**Enhanced Community Health Services:**
- Improved quality and consistency of care delivered by CHWs
- Increased reach and coverage of primary healthcare services
- Better integration between community and facility-based care
- Enhanced data collection and reporting from community level

**Strengthened Health System:**
- Real-time visibility into community health status and trends
- Evidence-based program planning and resource allocation
- Improved CHW performance monitoring and support
- Enhanced community engagement and health literacy
en.data_requirements:
**Patient and Community Data:**
- Individual patient records and health histories
- Household surveys and demographic information
- Disease surveillance and outbreak reporting
- Health behavior and risk factor data

**Program Management Data:**
- CHW activity reports and service delivery statistics
- Training records and competency assessments
- Supply inventory and equipment status
- Performance indicators and outcome measures
en.technology_components:
**Mobile Platform:**
- Android-based mobile applications with offline capabilities
- Clinical decision support algorithms and treatment protocols
- Electronic forms for data collection and patient registration
- Multimedia content for health education and training

**Backend Systems:**
- **OpenMRS** for patient data management and clinical workflows
- **DHIS2** for aggregate reporting, program monitoring, and integrated supply chain management
- Cloud-based data synchronization and backup systems
- SMS and USSD integration for areas with limited internet connectivity
en.challenges:
**Technology Adoption and Literacy:**
- Training CHWs with varying levels of digital literacy
- Ensuring platform usability in low-resource settings
- Managing device maintenance and technical support
- Addressing connectivity and power challenges in remote areas

**Integration and Sustainability:**
- Integrating CHW data with existing health information systems
- Ensuring sustainable financing for device procurement and maintenance
- Maintaining data quality and completeness
- Building local capacity for ongoing platform support
en.sustainability_considerations:
**Financial Sustainability:**
- Developing sustainable financing models for device procurement and maintenance
- Integrating CHW programs into national health budgets
- Creating incentive structures for CHW participation and performance
- Leveraging partnerships for ongoing technical and financial support

**Technical and Organizational Sustainability:**
- Building local technical capacity for platform maintenance and support
- Establishing clear governance structures for CHW program management
- Creating pathways for career advancement and professional development
- Ensuring community ownership and engagement in CHW programs

fr.title: Plateforme Numérique de Soutien aux Agents de Santé Communautaire
fr.purpose: Développer et déployer une plateforme numérique complète pour soutenir les agents de santé communautaire dans la prestation de services de soins primaires.
fr.scope:
Ce cas d'usage couvre la mise en œuvre d'une plateforme numérique qui :

- Équipe les agents de santé communautaire d'outils mobiles
- Fournit un soutien à la décision clinique
- Permet le rapport en temps réel
- Soutient l'éducation sanitaire
fr.actors:
**Agents de Santé Communautaire :**
- **Agents de Santé Villageois** – Fournissent services de santé de base
- **Volontaires de Santé Communautaire** – Soutiennent l'éducation sanitaire
- **Éducateurs Pairs** – Délivrent éducation sanitaire spécialisée
fr.preconditions:
**Infrastructure Technologique :**
- Couverture réseau mobile dans communautés cibles
- Smartphones ou tablettes pour agents
- Stations de charge solaire
- Connectivité internet de base
fr.process_steps:
**Phase 1 : Développement de Plateforme (Mois 1-6)**
1. Évaluer besoins des agents de santé communautaire
2. Développer applications mobiles avec capacités hors ligne
3. Créer outils de soutien à la décision clinique
4. Concevoir formulaires de collecte de données
fr.postconditions:
**Services de Santé Communautaire Améliorés :**
- Qualité améliorée des soins délivrés
- Portée accrue des services de soins primaires
- Meilleure intégration entre soins communautaires et hospitaliers
- Collecte de données améliorée
fr.data_requirements:
**Données Patients et Communautaires :**
- Dossiers patients individuels
- Enquêtes ménages et informations démographiques
- Surveillance des maladies
- Données comportementales de santé
fr.technology_components:
**Plateforme Mobile :**
- Applications mobiles Android avec capacités hors ligne
- Algorithmes de soutien à la décision clinique
- Formulaires électroniques pour collecte de données
fr.challenges:
**Adoption Technologique :**
- Former agents avec niveaux variés de littératie numérique
- Assurer utilisabilité de plateforme
- Gérer maintenance des appareils
fr.sustainability_considerations:
**Durabilité Financière :**
- Développer modèles de financement durables
- Intégrer programmes dans budgets nationaux
- Créer structures d'incitation

es.title: Plataforma Digital de Apoyo a Trabajadores de Salud Comunitaria
es.purpose: Desarrollar e implementar una plataforma digital integral para apoyar a trabajadores de salud comunitaria en la prestación de servicios de atención primaria.
es.scope:
Este caso de uso cubre la implementación de una plataforma digital que:

- Equipa trabajadores de salud comunitaria con herramientas móviles
- Proporciona apoyo a decisiones clínicas
- Permite reporte en tiempo real
- Apoya educación sanitaria
es.actors:
**Trabajadores de Salud Comunitaria:**
- **Trabajadores de Salud de Aldea** – Proporcionan servicios básicos de salud
- **Voluntarios de Salud Comunitaria** – Apoyan educación sanitaria
- **Educadores Pares** – Brindan educación sanitaria especializada
es.preconditions:
**Infraestructura Tecnológica:**
- Cobertura de red móvil en comunidades objetivo
- Teléfonos inteligentes o tabletas para trabajadores
- Estaciones de carga solar
- Conectividad internet básica
es.process_steps:
**Fase 1: Desarrollo de Plataforma (Meses 1-6)**
1. Evaluar necesidades de trabajadores de salud comunitaria
2. Desarrollar aplicaciones móviles con capacidades sin conexión
3. Crear herramientas de apoyo a decisiones clínicas
4. Diseñar formularios de recolección de datos
es.postconditions:
**Servicios de Salud Comunitaria Mejorados:**
- Calidad mejorada de atención brindada
- Alcance aumentado de servicios de atención primaria
- Mejor integración entre atención comunitaria y hospitalaria
- Recolección de datos mejorada
es.data_requirements:
**Datos de Pacientes y Comunitarios:**
- Registros individuales de pacientes
- Encuestas domiciliarias e información demográfica
- Vigilancia de enfermedades
- Datos de comportamiento de salud
es.technology_components:
**Plataforma Móvil:**
- Aplicaciones móviles Android con capacidades sin conexión
- Algoritmos de apoyo a decisiones clínicas
- Formularios electrónicos para recolección de datos
es.challenges:
**Adopción Tecnológica:**
- Entrenar trabajadores con niveles variados de alfabetización digital
- Asegurar usabilidad de plataforma
- Gestionar mantenimiento de dispositivos
es.sustainability_considerations:
**Sostenibilidad Financiera:**
- Desarrollar modelos de financiamiento sostenibles
- Integrar programas en presupuestos nacionales
- Crear estructuras de incentivos
